participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and adventurous, enjoys sharing experiences with others.
participant_1.background: I love to visit music blogs and forums, especially ones that are about music I sell in my store. I grill salmon and vegetables on my George Foreman grill at home for a quick and healthy meal. I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs. I eat my feelings. I want to be a good role model for my daughters.

participant_2.name: Daniel
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, appreciates family bonds and cooking.
participant_2.background: I was a good son, but we grew apart when I chose to follow my passion. I fear the day I will have to leave my room and interact with other people. I love to cook and try new recipes, but my favorite place to eat is at my family's house. My husband is a lawyer. I like to listen to music while I work out to help me push myself.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
Good! I am so happy to have the day off of work today!
Oh nice! What do you have planned for your day?
I am going to go visit my family and cook them dinner.
That sounds like a nice plan. I love to cook too.
Me too! I love trying new recipes and seeing what I can come up with.
Have you ever found a hidden cave when you were hiking?
No I have not! That sounds like an amazing experience.
It was! I was hiking with my dogs and we just stumbled across it.
Yeah it was really cool. We explored it for a little bit and then went on our way.
That sounds like an awesome experience. I would love to find a hidden cave one day.
Yeah it was a lot of fun. Maybe we could go hiking together sometime and try to find a hidden cave?
That would be really fun! I would love to do that.
Great! We can plan a day to go hiking soon
